item.title: Distant socializing
item.description: Disclaimer: This post is more about the day-to-day of social media, not the organizational capabilities it provides. Also, this post does not contain rigorous research as of now. Social Media bad The common opinion on the interwebs nowadays seems to be that social media is bad for you. The irony of spreading this message on social media platforms is not lost. I held a version of this position for a while.
